text:
"Flagg's Pond" (Staten Island): Three views of the small pond on the Ernest Flagg property, lying directly back of the northeast corner of the Moravian Cemetery.

June 30, 1926
Views 1, 2, 3

P. L. Sperr
title: Flagg's pond - Staten Island - [Ernest Flagg property.]
